thread.title: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62
thread.title_full: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62

title: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62
text: > Sports Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62 FILE - In this Dec. 15, 1973, file photo, UCLA's Bill Walton (32) and Dave Meyers, right, reach for a rebound following a shot by North Carolina State's Tommy Burleson (24) during an NCAA college basketball game in St. Louis. Meyers, the star forward who led UCLA to the 1975 NCAA basketball championship as the team's lone senior in coach John Wooden's final season and later played for the NBA's Milwaukee Bucks, died Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. He was 62. (AP Photo/File)
